name: Army Hunt Terrorist: Secret Re
description:
Army Hunt Terrorist: Secret Rescuse is adventure shooting game. Raise your deadly weapons and snipers to rescue hostag. You have to perform your duty as a trained fearless fighter in this war force to save the most important entity of your state. Kill the gangsters and sniper enemy gangs in this mission who are equipped with guns, so you have to be a great survival shooter for the hostage rescue adventure. This critical mission let you explore the war world of hostage rescue and multiple attacking features with powerful guns. Carryout the best of your skills in mission, portray yourself as a superagent of all the rescue heroes. Be ready to kill the gangsters and send the remaining criminals into the prison.
Features:
- Best game for shooting lovers
- Wide variety of weapons to defend yourself
- Exciting and thrilling challenges with multiple features
- Amazing 3D graphics and realistic sound effects
- Responsive controls for crazy shooting.
